Terms of Service

Our Terms of Service

In general, our terms of service merely ask that you not abuse our service by checking or uploading your data excessively (e.g. 6 or 7 times a day), knowingly uploading false information, or otherwise attempting to compromise the service. If you have questions, please feel free to raise them at our github issues page.
